title: Old Judge Mike King Kelly Boston PSA 1
author: piecesofthegame

posts.post_title: Old Judge Mike King Kelly Boston PSA 1
posts.post_content: Nice looking Kelly in Boston uniform. Excellent image. I have rarely seen this pose. This sold at auction not too long ago for $1200+(not to me). Looking for SOLD paypal gift or add 3% regular paypal.
Great price on a great card! Lowered to $950
